title: Just had a game a while ago where my bot lane lost
body:
Even though Mid & Jungle was fed with a even going Top laner we still lost.


I thought people was joking when they said this meta was purely based on Bottom, holy damn.

replies.body:
And I just had a game in which bot lane and mid won, but our top laner fed so hard we lost anyway.

Isn't it funny how anecdotes work?
